name: Food Battle (Jin.CA)
description: Food Battle is a puzzle game about the nonstop battle between health food and junk food. Who will be the winner? Explore an adventure where you must eliminate rival's foods by anulate them with your own foods.  It's your decision choose who team you support. Choose a character and play with a friend for watch who get highest score or play arcade mode and defeat the four infamous bosses dependent on who team you choosing . Welcome to death picnic, welcome to the Food Battle!
